txt.en:
'Well met, [placeholder], I hope the folk of North Down have not treated you too poorly during your time here? Alas, it is true that since rumours of dark tidings have come out of the East, so too have a great many men of shall we say... questionable repute? No doubt you've come across a few of them already.

But from what I hear you have taken up the cause of some number of the people of North Downs of late, and for that I commend you. Dark times such as these call for folk of action and bravery to stand forth!

I will be keeping an eye on you [placeholder], for I suspect that there is a tale to your deeds that shall soon be told.'
The North Downs were once the home to the capitol of the North Kingdom. Now it lies in ruin, inviting the return of Angmar.
Seek out Whelan Appledore and tell him of your accomplishments.
